item.title: Features
item.description: Below is a selection of news features on my research. Preethi Ramamoorthy (05 May 2017), The Hindu: Tennis enters the matrix Greg Garber (04 Feb 2017), ESPN: Australian Open introduced new advanced statistical metrics Christopher Clarey (13 Jan 2017), New York Times: At the Australian Open, Tennis Joins Its Sports Brethren on a New Surface: Data Analytics Stephanie Kovalchik (12 Jan 2017), The Conversation: Shorter or longer tennis matches: whatâ€™s the right balance?
